reviewText: I found this VHS enjoyable and informative. I've only seen 3 videos, but now I see that Amazon has several available.  I found the Mel Mercier tape "Bodhran & Bones to be more informative on technique.

I had hoped to have more emphasis on bones than I got; it was almost an afterthought on the DVD.  The bodhran part was also not very effective in communicating how to play, or exercises to help you become a better player.  I would have preferred less "demonstration" of him playing with a group, and more instruction
